mapper.update: update ujcms_task set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id_ = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_date_ = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date_ = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, current_ = #{current,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_ = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_ = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, status_ = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, error_info_ = #{errorInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_task (id_, site_id_, user_id_, name_, begin_date_, end_date_, current_, total_, type_, status_, error_info_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{current,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{errorInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
